item.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18725)
item.content:encoded:
Twitter @leslieherod was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=leslieherod&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pmaziere
item.author: Leslie Herod

item.title: The president has been pressured to act after two major mass...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

The president has been pressured to act after two major mass shootings took 18 lives in March.

huffpost.com

item.title: "On Friday, Major League Baseball announced it would move...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"On Friday, Major League Baseball announced it would move the 2021 All-Star Game and the MLB draft out of Atlanta in response to Georgia’s restrictive new voting law, which was signed by Gov. Brian Kemp last week."

Vox

Corporate America is starting to push back on Republican voter suppression efforts.

vox.com

Why the MLB pulled the All-Star Game from Atlanta, briefly explained

Corporate America is starting to push back on Republican voter suppression efforts.Corporate America is starting to push back on Republican voter suppression efforts.

item.title: "Students' mental health experiences during the...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"Students' mental health experiences during the pandemic have been mixed. Some kids are thriving. They like sleeping in a bit more and getting snacks when they want. Others, however, struggle"

Colorado Public Radio

Students' mental health experiences during the pandemic have been mixed. Some kids are thriving. They like sleeping in a bit more and getting snacks when they want. Others, however, struggle.

cpr.org

‘All Kinds Of Trauma’: Students Are Returning To School, But Are We Ready To Help Them Cope?

Students' mental health experiences during the pandemic have been mixed. Some kids are thriving. They like sleeping in a bit more and getting snacks when they want. Others, however, struggle.Students' mental health experiences during the pandemic have been mixed. Some kids are thriving. They like sleeping in a bit more and getting snacks when they want. Others, however, struggle.

item.title: "Colorado House passes first gun bill of the session,...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"Colorado House passes first gun bill of the session, requiring lost or stolen guns to be reported within five days."

The Denver Post

A bill requiring gun owners to report lost or stolen firearms to authorities within a five-day window passed the Colorado House on Monday. It must return to the Senate for a final vote before going…

denverpost.com

item.title: "People who are fully vaccinated against Covid-19 can...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"People who are fully vaccinated against Covid-19 can travel freely in the U.S., as long as they remain masked on planes, buses and trains, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announced Friday."

NBC News

Ultimately, the guidance may do little, as people are already traveling extensively nationwide.

nbcnews.com

Fully vaccinated people can travel in U.S. without tests or quarantines, CDC says

Ultimately, the guidance may do little, as people are already traveling extensively nationwide.Ultimately, the guidance may do little, as people are already traveling extensively nationwide.

item.title: I’ll take Colorado’s voting laws against Georgia’s new law...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

I’ll take Colorado’s voting laws against Georgia’s new law any day—and the MBL agrees! This is a true win for democracy.

Play Ball ⚾️ !

Coors Field is expected to be the site of the 2021 All-Star Game.

denverpost.com

2021 MLB All-Star Game coming to Coors Field, source says

Coors Field is expected to be the site of the 2021 All-Star Game.Coors Field is expected to be the site of the 2021 All-Star Game.

item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"Makisha Boothe is the founder and head business coach for Sistahbiz, a Denver-based organization with a big mission: helping Black women succeed in business"

9NEWS (KUSA)

Sistahbiz gives Black women the coaching and mentorship they need to become entrepreneurs.

9news.com

This Denver-based organization is helping Black women start their own businesses

Sistahbiz gives Black women the coaching and mentorship they need to become entrepreneurs.Sistahbiz gives Black women the coaching and mentorship they need to become entrepreneurs.
item.author: Leslie Herod

item.title: “The more interesting part of the dustup between Weld County...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

“The more interesting part of the dustup between Weld County Sheriff Steve Reams and state Rep. Leslie Herod is not what you see, conservative versus liberal, reckless use of a label and two public officials in a war of words and meanings. It’s what you don’t see.

There’s a lot of history and context to unpack.”

Joey Bunch: "The more interesting part of the dustup between Weld County Sheriff Steve Reams and state Rep. Leslie Herod is not what you see, conservative versus liberal, reckless use

coloradopolitics.com

INSIGHTS | Weld County sheriff deploys political identity distraction

Joey Bunch: "The more interesting part of the dustup between Weld County Sheriff Steve Reams and state Rep. Leslie Herod is not what you see, conservative versus liberal, reckless useJoey Bunch: "The more interesting part of the dustup between Weld County Sheriff Steve Reams and state Rep. Leslie Herod is not what you see, conservative versus liberal, reckless use

item.title: "The result was the "Coming Together" initiative...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"The result was the "Coming Together" initiative developed by the company, complete with an educational framework and curriculum."

Because of Them We Can by Eunique Jones

This is what the children need! Two new Black muppets are coming to Sesame Street to talk about race, Time reports. Since Sesame Street's inception in 1969, the show has tackled challenging issues related to the day's social climate in an age-appropriate way. In 1982, they debuted their episode on g...

becauseofthemwecan.com

Two New Black Muppets Are Coming To ‘Sesame Street’

This is what the children need! Two new Black muppets are coming to Sesame Street to talk about race, Time reports. Since Sesame Street's inception in 1969, the show has tackled challenging issues related to the day's social climate in an age-appropriate way. item.title: "The Museum for Black Girls is a vibrant, immersive,...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"The Museum for Black Girls is a vibrant, immersive, beautiful space, celebrating and uplifting Black women and girls all over the world. It is a place where Black girls can feel seen, safe, heard and encouraged to be just who they are."

Denver Westword

The creator of the Museum for Black Girls is just getting started.

westword.com

Charlie Billingsley Uplifts Black Women at the Museum for Black Girls

The creator of the Museum for Black Girls is just getting started.The creator of the Museum for Black Girls is just getting started.

item.title: "It is these photos that stand out in this large and...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"It is these photos that stand out in this large and diverse body of work, and most pointedly show the artist’s skill at reclamation."

The Denver Post

Zanele Muholi, "Somnyama Ngonyama/Hail the Dark Lioness," curated by Renée Mussai, through March 20 at the Center for Visual Art in Denver.

theknow.denverpost.com

Zanele Muholi is “reclaiming my Blackness” with powerful self-portraits at Denver’s Center for Visual Art

item.title: "Blackpackers is a nonprofit that aims to address the gap...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"Blackpackers is a nonprofit that aims to address the gap in representation in the outdoors. The organization provides gear, outdoor excursions and education for free or at a reduced cost."

CBS Denver

People from all over the world vacation in the Rocky Mountains, but resorts aren’t seeing much diversity of the slopes.

denver.cbslocal.com

Blackpackers Group Bridging Diversity Gap On Colorado's Slopes

People from all over the world vacation in the Rocky Mountains, but resorts aren’t seeing much diversity of the slopes.People from all over the world vacation in the Rocky Mountains, but resorts aren’t seeing much diversity of the slopes.

item.title: "If we don't begin to focus on health equity and...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"If we don't begin to focus on health equity and positive health outcomes for all people, especially people that data shows us are not thriving, not having positive outcomes, people will continue to die."

9NEWS (KUSA)

Nurses are taking a hard look at their ranks and a top down scrutiny of a lack of diversity.

9news.com

Diversifying the nursing workforce in Colorado

Nurses are taking a hard look at their ranks and a top down scrutiny of a lack of diversity.Nurses are taking a hard look at their ranks and a top down scrutiny of a lack of diversity.

Denver7

item.title: "...Our Brown Boy Joy, a company aimed at delivering...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"...Our Brown Boy Joy, a company aimed at delivering uplifting messages to boys of color. At 8 years old, Dee is the CEO."

Beacon Journal

Demetrius "Dee" Davis has a new friend, and he looks just like him.

beaconjournal.com

Focus on Black-owned businesses: 8-year-old CEO uplifts kids like him with Our Brown Boy Joy

Demetrius "Dee" Davis has a new friend, and he looks just like him.Demetrius "Dee" Davis has a new friend, and he looks just like him.
item.author: Leslie Herod

item.title: "For people serving time in jail or prison, it may seem...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

"For people serving time in jail or prison, it may seem like punishment ends on the day of release. But in fact, thousands of restrictions dictate the terms of life after incarceration, too."

NPR

There are 45,000 laws, policies and administrative sanctions in the U.S. that target people with criminal records. Reuben Jonathan Miller researches how they affect people's lives in Halfway Home.

npr.org

Out Of Prison But Still Trapped: Examining The 'Afterlife' Of Incarceration

There are 45,000 laws, policies and administrative sanctions in the U.S. that target people with criminal records. Reuben Jonathan Miller researches how they affect people's lives in Halfway Home.There are 45,000 laws, policies and administrative sanctions in the U.S. that target people with criminal records. Reuben Jonathan Miller researches how they affect people's lives in Halfway Home.
item.author: Leslie Herod

item.title: Incredibly humbled by this feature in 5280 and honored to have...
item.content:encoded:
Representative Leslie Herod

Incredibly humbled by this feature in 5280 and honored to have community support for this work. We all have a story to tell. Our stories are our strength and our voices will be heard.

"Forget political stereotypes: This history-making legislator is unapologetically progressive, is insistent that state government can be bipartisan (even now), and wants to transform the criminal justice system. And that's just the start of her ambitions.”

- 5280 Magazine

...

📸 Paul Miller Photography
Hair: Dornise LaTone Afhair
Styling: LILFRESHSAM

See MoreForget political stereotypes: This history-making legislator is unapologetically progressive, is insistent that state government can be bipartisan (even now), and wants to transform the criminal justice system. And that's just the start of her ambitions.

5280.com

State Representative Leslie Herod Has a Story to Share | 5280

Forget political stereotypes: This history-making legislator is unapologetically progressive, is insistent that state government can be bipartisan (even now), and wants to transform the criminal justice system. And that's just the start of her ambitions.Forget political stereotypes: This history-making legislator is unapologetically progressive, is insistent that state government can be bipartisan (even now), and wants to transform the criminal justice system.
